metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7638 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Map1toN in video/SDL_pixels.c. USN-4143-1 addressed serveral vulnerabilities in SDL 2.0. This update provides the corresponding fixes for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.

criterions.comment: libsdl1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libsdl2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
